amendment.description: To provide assistance relating to assessments and monitoring of waters in the State of Hawaii.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3601 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 45. Record Vote Number: 110.

action.text: Amendment SA 3601 proposed by Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S3966, S3968; text: CR S3966) To provide assistance relating to assessments and monitoring of waters in the State of Hawaii.
